unnormalised: Social Media is Buzzing with Brand Collabs!
normalised: Social Media is Buzzing with Brand Collabs!

unnormalised: Hey everyone, your Insta feed probably looks like mine – packed with brand collaborations! From established names like Amul butter teaming up with your favourite meme pages to smaller businesses doing influencer giveaways, it’s collab season.
normalised: Hey everyone, your Insta feed probably looks like mine – packed with brand collaborations! From established names like Amul butter teaming up with your favorite meme pages to smaller businesses doing influencer giveaways, it's collab season.

unnormalised: We're seeing a major uptick in micro-influencer campaigns, especially targeting regional audiences. Think Chennai food bloggers promoting local biryani joints or Delhi-based fashionistas showcasing festive collections for Diwali. Smart, right?
normalised: We're seeing a major uptick in micro-influencer campaigns, especially targeting regional audiences. Think Chennai food bloggers promoting local biryani joints or Delhi-based fashionistas showcasing festive collections for Diwali. Smart, right?

unnormalised: Even educational institutions are getting in on the action. IIT Bombay recently partnered with a tech brand for a student hackathon, offering prizes worth Rs. 50,000!
normalised: Even educational institutions are getting in on the action. I I T Bombay recently partnered with a tech brand for a student hackathon, offering prizes worth rupees fifty thousand!

unnormalised: But are these collabs actually effective? Some are hitting it out of the park, driving real sales and engagement. Others? Well, let’s just say a sponsored post isn't going to automatically get you that viral fame!
normalised: But are these collabs actually effective? Some are hitting it out of the park, driving real sales and engagement. Others? Well, let's just say a sponsored post isn't going to automatically get you that viral fame!

unnormalised: Brands are spending big R.s., hoping for that sweet ROI. Keep your eyes peeled during Onam; you'll see an explosion of collaborations, that’s for sure! It's like a digital Diwali dhamaka for brands. This trend is only going to grow as we head into Q4 of 2024.
normalised: Brands are spending big rupees, hoping for that sweet R O I. Keep your eyes peeled during Onam; you'll see an explosion of collaborations, that's for sure! It's like a digital Diwali dhamaka for brands. This trend is only going to grow as we head into Q four of two thousand and twenty four.
